sentence.Network_en: The temperance league wanted to close all the saloons in town.
sentence.Network_cn: 禁酒联合会要关闭镇上所有的酒吧.

sentence.Network_en: The temperance [ dry ; anti - alcohol ] movement revived in the city.
sentence.Network_cn: 这个城市的 禁酒 运动又活跃起来了.

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Anglo-Norman French temperaunce, from Latin temperantia 'moderation', from temperare 'restrain'

entry.def: If you believe in temperance, you disapprove of drinking alcohol.

example.ex: ...a reformed alcoholic extolling the joys of temperance.
example.tran: 对戒酒的好处赞不绝口的已成功戒酒的酒徒

entry.def: A person who shows temperance has a strong mind and does not eat too much, drink too much, or do too much of anything.

example.ex: The age of hedonism is being ushered out by a new era of temperance.
example.tran: 享乐主义时代正让位于一个注重节制的时代。

auth_sentence.content: A lead article satirizing American temperance groups.
auth_sentence.res_content: A lead article satirizing American temperance groups.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: A lead article satirizing American temperance groups.

auth_sentence.content: It pleased God to give me much patience and temperance to beare this...ingratitude.
auth_sentence.res_content: It pleased God to give me much patience and temperance to beare this...ingratitude.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It pleased God to give me much patience and temperance to beare this...ingratitude.

auth_sentence.content: Temperance is the excellence of the will in controlling the passion for pleasure.
auth_sentence.res_content: Temperance is the excellence of the will in controlling the passion for pleasure.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Temperance is the excellence of the will in controlling the passion for pleasure.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. =time,表示"时间或时间引起的现象"; 2. = "情绪,回火"

stems_affixes.word_buile: temper情绪,脾气+ate……的→脾气[不坏]→有节制的
temper情绪,回火→n.脾气;韧度v.调和,使缓和;使回火
temper情绪+ance表名词→脾气[不坏]→有节制
temper情绪,脾气+ament→脾气状态→性情
temper情绪,回火→n.脾气;韧度v.调和,使缓和;使回火

sentences.en: The old man preached temperance to young people.
sentences.cn: 那位老人劝年轻人戒酒。

sentences.en: The temperance league wanted to close all the saloons in town.
sentences.cn: 禁酒联合会要关闭镇上所有的酒吧。
